title: Ticket #1607: The windows-only StatInfo constructor needs to be unit tested
description: StatInfo( const char* dirpath, const char* filename, time_t time_access, time_t time_create, time_t time_modify, filesize_t fsize, bool is_dir, bool is_symlink ) is a windows-only constructor for the StatInfo object. When the unit tests work on windows, tests should be added to the StatInfo object unit tests for this constructor.
